page.title: 02UMBERLEIGH POST OFFICES
page.content: UMBERLEIGH POST OFFICE. Umberleigh post office was built in 1946. Before the post office used to be where the Gbles is now. The number of postmen that work in Umberleigh is 5 full-time and 2 part-time. The postmistress has been working in the post office for 8 years. On Monday the post office has approx 15 customers a day, Tuesday 35, Wednesday 15, Thursday40-50 (pension day) Friday 17, Saturday 12. The opening hours are 9am-1pm, 2pm-5.30pm, Saturdays 9am to 1pm. Sundays closed. Because the trains stop at Umberleigh it is a main post office for the area.
